text: "Good Morning" is a single on Kanye West's 3rd studio album Graduation. The song was released in late August 2007 on iTunes. "Good Morning" is the 1st track on the album. It has samples of "Someone Saved My Life Tonight" as sung by Elton John.Additional vocals were provided by Connie Mitchell, Tony "Penafire" Williams, and Jay-Z. ==References== Category:2007 songs Category:Kanye West songs
title: Good Morning (Kanye West song)
